header.title: Frontend
header.subtitle: Developer
header.text: Who turns ideas into seamless digital experiences

contentBlock.title: About me
contentBlock.text:
Hey there, I’m Frank Struik — a frontend developer who believes websites should not only work but also feel good.
I’ve worked on projects big and small, from e-commerce platforms to storytelling websites, and I enjoy the challenge of turning abstract ideas into clean, functional code. My secret superpower? Writing code that future-me (and other developers) can actually read without crying.
When I’m not coding, you might find me experimenting with new tech, hunting for clever UI details online, or trying to convince people that dark mode really does make everything better.

items.title: Discovery & planning
items.text: I begin by reviewing the designs, clarifying requirements, and deciding on the best tools to bring the project to life.

items.title: Development
items.text: Then I build dynamic, responsive, and pixel-perfect pages — always keeping performance and security in mind.

items.title: Delivery & Support
items.text: Finally, I deliver clean, well-documented code and remain available for ongoing support and improvements.

items.title: How do we communicate during the project?
items.text: I’m focused mainly on development. But if you already have a design (Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD), I’ll bring it to life. If you need design support, I can also collaborate with designers from my network.

Working with Frank was a pleasure from start to finish. He took my Figma designs and turned them into a lightning-fast pixel-perfect website. Communication was smooth, and he even suggested improvements I hadn`t thought of.
items.author: Laura B
